name: OnBeforeSave
description: An lifecycle hook which is called before an configuration is saved.
rawdescription: An lifecycle hook which is called before an configuration is saved.

methods.name: onBeforeSave
methods.rawdescription:
Called before a configuration object is saved. The function can be used to manipulate the
passed config object or to cancel the saving (return false or Observable<boolean>).
methods.description: Called before a configuration object is saved. The function can be used to manipulate the passed config object or to cancel the saving (return false or Observable).
